title: Get Ready
Longer Text
text: Lukas, 21. Loves cats and code. He started with 17 years to accomplish his dream to work as a freelancer and co-entrepreneur. Over the years he worked around the world for startups and small businesses. Gained experience in $Design, $Code and professional $Teamwork.
He is known for his work. Trusted with extraordinary work along the beauty of code to create projects people love. In many ways he has groundbreaking knowledge of the most important features of code.

cards.title: Javascript
cards.paragraph: Having the possibility to create everything on the internet is just awesome. By mastering the Web fundamentals Lukas is given the power to create the most fun and professional projects.

cards.title: VueJS
cards.paragraph: Lukas is experienced in the nature of VueJs and with all its features. From building small projects in weeks up to large scale projects which define the importance of the framework to the real world.

cards.title: Solidity
cards.paragraph: To dive deeper in the Web3 space it's always helpful to learn new technologies and to rule them. By using Solidity to create smart contracts, is the first step made.

cards.title: Tailwind CSS
cards.paragraph: Lukas understands the importance of UI/UX in any project. It's not just colors and style, it's getting the most out of the product by taking the user through an unforgettable experience that remains in the head.

attentioner.title: Let's build your dream next.
attentioner.subtitle: Join the visionary style of tomorrow.
